alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm wind gusts will impact portions of Jefferson, southern Saline and western Gage Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Wilber to 5 miles south of Endicott. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wilber and De Witt around 905 PM CDT. Diller and Clatonia around 915 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cortland and Odell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
